commutative_cube.description: Tri-Unity (δ, Φ, Π) cube with λ as a curvature/deformation layer acting naturally on all vertices and edges.

B110.label: ΦδB
B110.meaning: Projection of δB or deviation of ΦB (commuting).

B101.label: ΠδB
B101.meaning: Evaluation of δB or deviation along evaluated path.

B011.label: ΠΦB
B011.meaning: Evaluation of ΦB or projected evaluation.

B111.label: ΠΦδB
B111.meaning: All three applied; all paths agree by commutativity.
